#include <stdio.h>
int count[1000001];
int main(void) {
	// your code goes here
	int j,N,num;
	long long ans;
	for(j=0;j<=1000000;j++)count[j]=0;
	scanf("%d",&N);
	ans=(long long)N*(N-1)/2;
	for(j=0;j<N;j++)
	{
	    scanf("%d",&num);
	    count[num]++;
	}
	for(j=0;j<=1000000;j++)
	{
	    int n=count[j];
	    ans-=(long long)n*(n-1)/2;
	}
	printf("%lld\n",ans);
	return 0;
}
